title: Ban Choices for Draft

Pantheon
Xin Zhao
Garen
Yasuo
Rengar
Master Yi

Fizz

Diana

replies.body:
why is garen worth a ban?
that seems like a waste to me
I just feel he has very little counter play he's hard to kill his silence is really strong and he kind of rules the pick scene for bronzies I don't ban those that aren't play that much.
Why did you list lux as an adc and jinx as a support?

Luz is a ban choice because of how good she is at bullying a lane as a sup that's why she's my top pick from what I noticed she's hard to deal with and usually wins the lane for her adc easily with her damage output. Jinx for support because I see my sup die all the time to her. That's why if you noticed it doesn't matter where they are.
